name: Rainbow Desserts Maker!
description:
Welcome to the Rainbow Unicorn Ice Cream Game. Here we can make various rainbow desserts together! Such as rainbow cake pops, rainbow cupcake, and my favorite rainbow slushy! Try to mix different colors of cakes, cream or juice to create the unique magic rainbow desserts!
Come on! Let's get start now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy rainbow foods
-Three kinds of rainbow foods to make: rainbow cake pop, rainbow cupcake and rainbow slushy
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: spatula, juice dispenser, freezer, ice cube mold, ice crusher, flour sieve, mixer, cupcake mold, oven, plastic wrap, induction cooker, pan, spoon and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: chocolate, juice, butter, flour, cream, salt, milk, candies, fruits, sprinkles, food dyes and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different courses for rainbow cake pop, rainbow cupcake, and rainbow slushy
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits and cream toppings
